name: Guide
content: Guide was a short-statured man whom appeared to Ferus Olin and Trever Flume beneath the crust of Coruscant while they were pursuing Jedi Knight Fy-Tor-Ana and the resistance leader Solace. Guide, obviously a pseudonym, agreed to lead them to Solace. When they came to the vast black ocean that was set under the surface of the planet, Guide revealed the hidden base of Solace's resistance movement and introduced the pair to her there.
